entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
